name: TheBigBrooklynBiteBar
description:
As a Brooklyn tourist you really want to experience everything that the borough has to offer. One of those things is the best food you've ever had. But new years resolutions, personal goals and such means you don't really want to get to carbed, protiened, or sugared up. Navigate one of Brooklyn's biggest bite bars and hopefully stay healthy!

A/< D/> = Move
